name: mc-local-cross-asset-imbalance
description: Cross-asset user transfers (USDC→USDT) drain USDT on one chain. Rebalancer must use rebalance_collateral to move USDT between chains.
expectedBehavior:
2 cross-asset transfers of 50 USDT each (100 total demand).
System has 100 USDT total (50/chain). First transfer drains chain2 USDT to 0.
Rebalancer must rebalance USDT from chain1 to chain2 to enable the 2nd transfer.
Tests same-asset cross-chain rebalancing under cross-asset traffic.

defaultStrategyConfig.routeHints:
Available paths:
- rebalance_collateral tool: same-asset cross-chain (USDC chain1↔chain2, USDT chain1↔chain2)
- supply_collateral tool: reverse rebalance via transferRemote (inventory preserved)
- mock_lifi_swap tool: swap between assets in your wallet (same-chain, e.g. USDC→USDT)
defaultStrategyConfig.policyProse:
User traffic is cross-asset (USDC in, USDT out), draining USDT on chain2.
Use rebalance_collateral to move USDT from chain1 to chain2.
Prefer rebalance_collateral for same-asset distribution imbalances.
